items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely buy!
items.body: It fits great and looks just like the picture. It looks tiny out of the package like those old popcorn shirts and was a little difficult to get on at first, but it wasn't too tight and was very comfortable once on! I'm 5'8 210lbs with a large chest and large hips and the large fit me perfectly. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the tall girls too!
items.body: I am 6'2 and weigh 250. My upper arms are on the larger side. I ordered the large. This fits (even though it's a little snug feeling as you are putting it on), I can move, breath and it's long enough for me with coverage in all the right areas. I toiled for weeks before deciding to try due to in size irregularity. Glad I did as it has great stretchiness while still seeming to be of decent quality following one wear. Read more
items.author: Erika

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hugged the body in all the right places.
items.body: VERY STRETCHY. Perfect fit. It took a little getting into. Once it was on it was pretty. Price point was great. Read more
items.author: Debbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and sexy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.
